objects.text:
• Authentic blend of cumin & spices
• Ready-to-serve with spill-proof cap
• Premium natural ingredients
• Refreshing digestive properties
From Paper Boat's 'Drinks and Memories' collection

product_details.name: Paper Boat Jaljeera | Refreshing Traditional Indian Spiced Beverage | Ready-to-Serve Drink
product_details.description:
• Authentic Indian Jaljeera flavor - A perfect blend of cumin and traditional spices
• Convenient shake-and-sip packaging with spill-proof cap
• Ready-to-serve beverage - No preparation needed
• Premium quality natural ingredients
• Refreshing summer drink with digestive properties
• Modern twist to traditional Indian beverage
• Portable and travel-friendly packaging
• Perfect accompaniment for meals or as a refreshing drink
• Vegetarian product certified
• From Paper Boat's 'Drinks and Memories' collection
• Hygienic and sealed packaging for freshness
• No artificial preservatives or colors

banner_details:
The banner showcases a promotional design for a traditional Indian beverage, set against a diagonally split background with an earthy yellow and beige gradient. The layout features a strong visual hierarchy, starting with a bold, large-sized title (`heading`) placed at the top left. Directly beneath it are two subheading layers (`subheading_1` and `subheading_2`) in uppercase, conveying the beverage’s cultural roots. The middle-left section presents detailed product benefits in a compact, bulleted format (`description`). Pricing (`price`) is prominently displayed in large font near the center-left. A green rectangular CTA button (`cta_background` with `cta`) reads “Buy Now”. The product image (`product_image`) occupies the right half, while the `tagline` sits subtly at the bottom left. The design integrates wavy and circular graphical elements to add visual interest.

**Color Palette:**
- Amber Yellow: `#D4A017`
- Deep Brown: `#5B3A29`
- Light Beige: `#F7E7C7`
- Earthy Orange: `#C68E17`
- Olive Green: `#8BAE37`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image of Paper Boat’s Jaljeera drink utilizes a clean and earthy color palette that reflects freshness, tradition, and natural ingredients. The primary colors include mustard yellow (#E3B634) used in the cap, text, and base, olive green (#93A093) in the “paper boat” text, bright green (#2CA948) in the mint leaf, and shades of brown (#764C20, #B2875A) in cumin seed illustrations. The white background (#FFFFFF) ensures clarity and contrast, highlighting the product’s elements. These colors blend harmoniously, emphasizing a natural, nostalgic feel while strategically standing out to guide the eyes to brand name, flavor, and product appeal.
